title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, March 2, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of the children’s author who wrote, “A person's a person, no matter how small.” Theodor Geisel, better known as Dr. Seuss (1904).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the children’s author who wrote, “A person's a person, no matter how small.” Theodor Geisel, better known as Dr. Seuss (1904).
